text: Petropavlovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Nizhnebikkuzinsky Selsoviet, Kugarchinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 4 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 28 km from Mrakovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Kugarchinsky District
title: Petropavlovka, Kugarchinsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
